item.title: Congratulations Andy, recipient of the STAR Spot Award!
item.dc:creator: Chris Shaffer
item.description:
During the period of four months (from July through the end of October 2020) Andy Panado provided critical service for the library beyond his regular duties, enabling successful completion of the UCSF Special Collections Inventory and Cataloging Project of the Rare Book collection. In January 2020 the library contracted with ...

Read moreCongratulations Andy, recipient of the STAR Spot Award!

item.title: We have a new AUL for Research and Learning
item.dc:creator: Chris Shaffer
item.description:
I am pleased to announce that Micquel Little has been appointed Associate University Librarian (AUL) for Research and Learning. She holds a BA and MLIS from the University of Pittsburgh and an MBA from St. John Fisher College. Micquel has substantial leadership experience and a contagious attitude for collaboration. Her ...

Read moreWe have a new AUL for Research and Learning

item.title: Kalmanovitz Library security project funded
item.dc:creator: Chris Shaffer
item.description: I’m very happy to announce that funding has been secured for the third floor renovation! No word yet on when construction will start – we will share that information as soon as it is available.

item.title: Goodbye and Good Luck to Kemi
item.dc:creator: Chris Shaffer
item.description:
It’s with very mixed feelings that I announce Kemi’s departure from the Library staff. Kemi has served us well as the Library’s first communications manager for nearly five years, and now it’s time for her to move on to her next adventure. Beginning Monday, September 2, Kemi will begin a ...

Read moreGoodbye and Good Luck to Kemi

item.title: Congratulations to Whit
item.dc:creator: Chris Shaffer
item.description:
Whit once again received the School of Pharmacy Dean’s Apple Award for outstanding student evaluations. And hot on the heels of that news, the School of Medicine sent a hearty thank-you to Whit for his work on the Mapping & Integration Curriculum Governance Committee. He played a key role in ...

Read moreCongratulations to Whit

item.title: Jill appointed to Faculty
item.dc:creator: Chris Shaffer
item.description: Congratulations to Jill Barr-Walker on her appointment to the faculty as an Assistant Adjunct Professor in the Department of Obstetrics, Gynecology & Reproductive Services in the School of Medicine!

item.title: Director of Teaching and Learning Technology
item.dc:creator: Chris Shaffer
item.description:
Congratulations to Gail, who successfully worked with IT Governance Committee on Education Technology (CET) on a funding request. While we didn’t get permanent funding, we did get one year of money and we were asked to refine our “ask” and bring it forward for consideration next year. Jon Johnson will ...

Read moreDirector of Teaching and Learning Technology

item.title: New Assistant University Librarian
item.dc:creator: Chris Shaffer
item.description: Please join me in congratulating Polina on her appointment as Assistant University Librarian for Archives and Special Collections, effective Monday, April 1. Polina retains her title of University Archivist in her new position.

item.title: David Wu won the Grad Slam!
item.dc:creator: Chris Shaffer
item.description: Congratulations to David Wu, Makers Lab volunteer and partner, on winning the Grad Slam!

item.title: Black Caucus Award for archives Team
item.dc:creator: Chris Shaffer
item.description:
At the 29th Annual Black Heritage Month Gala on Saturday, Polina received an award for her efforts to preserve and make available the history of the UCSF Black Caucus. Polina and her team have done an incredible amount of work to help the Black Caucus share their history with the ...
